mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COING_SURVEY_INFO A WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.SVQU_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVQU_TYPE , A.SVQU_TITLE , A.SVQU_REQ_YN , A.SVQU_MINCHK_NUM , A.SVQU_ORDER_NO , A.SVQU_REG_DTTM , A.SVQU_REG_ID , A.SVQU_REG_IP , A.SVQU_UPDT_DTTM , A.SVQU_UPDT_ID , A.SVQU_UPDT_IP , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COING_SURVEY_ANSWER WHERE SVIN_ID = A.SVIN_ID AND SVQU_ID = A.SVQU_ID ) AS totalAnswerCnt FROM COING_SURVEY_QUESTION A WHERE A.SVIN_ID = #{svinId} AND A.SVQU_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.SVQU_ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT A.SVQU_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVQU_TYPE , A.SVQU_TITLE , A.SVQU_REQ_YN , A.SVQU_MINCHK_NUM , A.SVQU_ORDER_NO , A.SVQU_REG_DTTM , A.SVQU_REG_ID , A.SVQU_REG_IP , A.SVQU_UPDT_DTTM , A.SVQU_UPDT_ID , A.SVQU_UPDT_IP FROM COING_SURVEY_QUESTION A WHERE A.SVQU_ID = #{svquId} AND A.SVIN_ID = #{svinId} AND A.SVQU_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.SVEX_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVQU_ID , A.SVEX_KEY , A.SVEX_TITLE , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COING_SURVEY_ANSWER WHERE SVIN_ID = A.SVIN_ID AND SVQU_ID = A.SVQU_ID AND SVEX_ID = A.SVEX_ID ) AS answerCnt FROM COING_SURVEY_EXAMPLE A WHERE A.SVIN_ID = #{svinId} AND A.SVQU_ID = #{svquId} AND A.SVEX_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.SVEX_KEY
SELECT A.SVEX_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVQU_ID , A.SVEX_KEY , A.SVEX_TITLE FROM COING_SURVEY_EXAMPLE A WHERE A.SVEX_ID = #{svexId} AND A.SVEX_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.SVVO_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVVO_REG_DTTM , A.SVVO_REG_IP , A.SVVO_USER_ID , A.SVVO_USER_NM FROM COING_SURVEY_VOTE A LEFT JOIN COING_SURVEY_INFO B ON (A.SVIN_ID = B.SVIN_ID) WHERE A.SVIN_ID = #{svinId} ORDER BY A.SVVO_ID ASC

SELECT A.SVAN_ID , A.SVIN_ID , A.SVVO_ID , A.SVQU_ID , A.SVEX_ID , (SELECT SVEX_TITLE FROM COING_SURVEY_EXAMPLE WHERE SVEX_ID = A.SVEX_ID) AS svexTitle , A.SVAN_REMARKS FROM COING_SURVEY_ANSWER A WHERE A.SVIN_ID = #{svinId} AND A.SVVO_ID = #{svvoId} ORDER BY A.SVAN_ID DESC

SELECT A.INDEX_KEY indexKey , A.SITE_ID siteId , A.CODE code , A.TITLE title , A.CONTENT content , A.REG_DATE regDate , A.UPDT_DATE updtDate , A.LINK_URL linkUrl , A.NAVI navi FROM VIEW_SEARCH_SITE_CONTENT A WHERE 1=1
AND A.SITE_ID = #{siteId}
